title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses Tom Brady not committing to playing next season and why he would be making a mistake by retiring right now. He explains why the Packers need to do everything they can to keep Aaron Rodgers after another early exit from the playoffs. He also reacts to the surprising breaking news of the day; Sean Payton is stepping down as head coach of the Saints. Plus, NFL insider Peter Schrager joins the show to give the latest on what's next for Payton after leaving New Orleans. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
